Magic Notes:
Bastion Of Law: R30' Spend 1 - 5 Sorcery Points to absorb equal d8 HP damage to target until next use or long rest
Clockwork Cavalcade: 30' cu heals 100 HP total to targets, repairs damaged objects, and dismisses target spells up to 6th level 1/long rest (spend 7 Sorcery Points for additional)
Elemental Adept (Cold): Cold spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Fire): Fire spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Thunder spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Empowered Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to re-roll 3 spell damage dice
Flexible Casting: Convert Sorcery Points to and from spell slots
Font Of Magic: Use 20 Sorcery Points/long rest
Heightened Spell: Spend 3 Sorcery Points for target Disadv on spell save
Psionic Sorcery: Cast spell using Sorcery Points instead of spell slot
Restore Balance: R60' Cancel target Adv or Disadv on roll 6/long rest
Seeking Spell: Spend 2 Sorcery Points to reroll missed spell attack
Sorcerous Restoration: Regain 4 Sorcery Points/short rest
Subtle Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to cast w/out somatic or verbal components
Transmuted Spell: Change spell damage from acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder to another type
Warping Implosion: 120' teleport inflicts 3d10 HP in 30' radius of starting position and pulls 30' (Str half, no pull) 1/long rest (spend 5 Sorcery Points for additional)
